Package gui

The Graphical User Interface package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Commands
    The class Commands extends JFrame opens a scrollable JTextArea in which the user can see the results before saving them into a file.
    PopUpHelp
    The class PopUpHelp extends JFrame and it's a window that contains a brief instructions manual on how to run the application.
    PopUpInfo
    The class PopUpInfo extends JFrame and it's a window that contains information about the project and the group members.
    PopUpMessage
    The class PopUpMessage extends JFrame and it's a window that is meant to give some feedback to the user about a specific task.
    PopUpOptions
    The class PopUpOptions extends JFrame and it's a window that contains several fields that allow the user to pick the desired parameters to run the application.
    SwingApplication
    The class SwingApplication extends JFrame and it's the "front-page" of our GUI.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WrongFileExtension
    An exception that is thrown when the file extension of the input files is not the correct one.
    WrongInput
    An exception that is thrown when the input arguments are not placed in the correct input format.
    WrongScoreType
    An exception that is thrown when a score type selected is different from the types considered in the project.

Package gui Description

The Graphical User Interface package.
Author:
Nuno Mendes, Sofia Silva, Tiago Ricardo
